game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact known as the Orb of Lutrisha.
game.description: The Orb of Lutrisha, a powerful artifact, has been stolen by goblins. It is your job to infiltrate their lair and retrieve it.

task.description: Search the woods east of the High Priest's temple to find the goblin lair.
Infiltrate the lair and retrieve the orb without being detected.

task.objective: Return the Orb to High Priest Erynel
task.description: Once you have the orb, return it to the High Priest for your reward.
